body:
@adg 

> Hey, sorry it came off that way.

Seriously no apology needed, I'm sure you're a good dude. It was more just a general comment to hopefully provide positive reflection because I seem to hear that a lot (whether directed at me or others).

I guess I don't see golang in the "late stage" is all. Only soon-to-be-deprecated is in late state to me :)

Keep up the good work, I enjoy (most of) your language, thanks!
